localize.text: Upon using previous chapter's Combat Pages, all dice on the Page gain + 1 Power. Combat Pages from the previous chapter appears in the shop.
Upon use, get {0} Ahn. Increases by 3 for every entry into a normal battle.
When this character uses Combat Page, Manikin uses the same Combat Page as a one-sided attack on the target.
Get 'Immobilization' this Scene. When The Puppeteer uses Combat Page in this Scene, this character uses the same Combat Page as a one-sided attack on the target.
Add '{0}' Combat Page to hand. It costs 0 until used.
During Canard and Urban Myth Chapter, librian's Emotion Level starts at 1.

Skip Combat Page reward to get Meat. Gather 5 Meat to complete the Quest.
Gathered Meat : {0}
During this chapter, at the start of the Scene, every Librarians share the following effects: -3 Strength -3 Endurance -3 Protection -3 Fragile -Immobilization
Doesn't get Combat Page reward anymore
Whenever gaining Combat Pagee, enhance it
Cannot buy items from this shop.
After a random event, gain one Urban Legend Combat Page reward.
After a normal battle, gain one Urban Legend Combat Page reward.
All Librarians can use ranged Combat Page.
